about_the_game:
Story
Powerful, cruel and selfish Rakshasa demons controlled a vast land, with their "Peacock King" maintaining a thousand-year-dynasty.
They did just too much to bear, and mortals, though with few miracles, rose against these mighty, magical nobles.
Among the few strengths the rebellion did have was Tia, the protagonist, who could resist all mind-controlling enemies she met. This night when one of the Rakshasa princes was away from the capital, she went to assassinate him-probably the most feared of all the princes.
A pity she failed, and a shock he suddenly proposed to her.

Later generations would learn that the Peacock Dynasty was doomed by the prince's proposal, but how did things turn out like that? What decisions did the protagonist make during the course? How did she feel when all fights had been fought? Did she fall in love with the Rakshasa prince or not? Your choices would finish the story.

Main Characters






Features

◇ Customize your name
◇ Crafting your personality through choices
◇ Interact and fall in love with a mysterious prince, or with your old comrade, or date both of them at the same time, or stay single if you would like
◇ Fight your enemies, or manipulate them to their destruction
◇ Unlock CGs, a locked route, achievements and misc collections according to your game progress
◇ Explore 3 Routes and 5 major Endings

content_descriptors.notes:
This work contains character deaths and desperations. Most deaths are in a dramatic, supernatural way, not realistic, but I mention this in case you get uncomfortable with any kind of character death.
Aside from these fantasy fights, there are characters talking about killing and abusing others with little care. (The protagonist would NOT be raped or abused sexually, the romance options would not either.

name: Romance of a Demon Kingdom's Fall
short_description: In a fantasy world, play as a girl who rebelled against a group of demonic rulers, searching for all truths about the royal House, and about her heart.
